publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5335 Ross Finnie: Crofting Reform etc. Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Crofting Reform etc. Bill be passed. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*
S2M-5335 Crofting Reform etc. Bill (lodged on 15 December 2006) Sarah Boyack*

S2M-5335 Ross Finnie: Crofting Reform etc. Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Crofting Reform etc. Bill be passed. Supported by: Rhona Brankin, Sarah Boyack Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
